summary: Comprehensive testing of JMON Studio music creation platform completed. All major features working correctly including project management, JMON code compilation, audio preview, full-screen openDAW integration, and professional UI. Previously reported issues (import statement errors, black editor area, no sound) have been resolved.

ui_bugs.issue: Runtime error showing 'ResizeObserver loop completed with undelivered notifications'
ui_bugs.impact: Visual error overlay appears but doesn't affect functionality

design_issues.issue: Some pre-existing projects may contain import statements causing compilation errors
design_issues.workaround: Create new projects which use clean JMON code without import statements

browser_warnings.issue: Browser security warnings about AudioContext requiring user gesture
browser_warnings.impact: Normal browser behavior, not a bug

passed_tests: Backend API health check (100% success rate - 10/10 endpoints)
JMON code compilation without import statement errors
Code editor displays properly without black areas at bottom
Audio preview works with actual sound output and controls
Full-screen openDAW modal opens and functions properly
DAW transport controls (play, stop, record) work with audio
Track visualization shows clips correctly with timeline ruler
Sync buttons function between JMON and DAW
Professional UI styling with proper color contrast
Responsive design adapts to tablet and mobile viewports
Keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+Enter for compile) work correctly
Project persistence and loading from database
All buttons and interactive elements have proper hover states
Real audio playback using Tone.js integration
Bidirectional sync functionality between JMON and openDAW
action_item_for_E1: Minor cleanup needed: 1) Fix ResizeObserver runtime error in console, 2) Clean up any existing projects with import statements to prevent compilation errors. All major functionality is working excellently.

performance_notes.backend_response_times: All API calls completed within 2 seconds
performance_notes.audio_latency: Audio playback starts immediately when triggered
performance_notes.daw_modal_performance: Full-screen DAW opens smoothly with 2-second loading simulation
